biotools.summary: A collection of tools for computing, evaluating and manipulating multiple alignments of DNA, RNA, protein sequences and structures. Includes M-Coffee, R-Coffee, Expresso, PSI-Coffee, iRMSD-APDB.

bioschemas.name: T-Coffee (SIB)
